title: very high ping
body: whe from south africa since yesterday whe have a very high ping and lag a lot then get reported for feeding can you look into it pls ping normal 203-246 know 305-735 can you look into it pls look at everything on pc and my internet in they say everthing is fine

replies.body:
If you're playing on OCE then, unfortunately the problem problem lies with your ISP's upstream. They are limited number of sub-sea cables connection Africa to Australia (only one via SE Asia), and when that breaks, you'll get routed via EU. Hence the high pings. 

Have you tried playing on EUW instead?
